title: If riot removes conqueror, then remove bruisers
body:
We have 1 Freaking Rune since years. Just remove the AD from it and it is balanced. The ad is too abusive on Jax and Irelia

Keep conqueror and nerf magic pen and Electrolute

replies.body: just remove champions from the game. then 10 people will just queue up to watch some minions duke it out for a bit before one side randomly wins

I'd argue the true damage part of Conqueror is what makes Jax feel unfair to play against. You straight up can't reliably build against him when he's doing all 3 types of damage all at once. 

Fervor felt overall more healthy to play against imo. You couldn't use minions to stack Fervor. It promoted a drawn out fight, it rewarded you for interacting with the laner, not auto a minion and have Fervor fully stacked before you even touch the enemy champ lmao.

With Conqueror in the game, tanks are practically nonexistent until high elo. But even then most of them are terrible outside of support.
